markdown: ISSUES FOR GENERAL CONSIDERATION Sub-Agenda for 9:30 a.m. - Monday, May 10 --- 1. What should the role of Health Department be as the County moves toward Comprehensive Coordinated Health Service Centers? 2. What is the future role of Health Districts? Should we recommend shift in direction of further decentralization? 3. Environmental Health --- Should there be a recommendation for organizational changes to provide for stronger focus? 4. Should there be a central office for planning and evaluation? What would the relation of such an office be to Research and to Records and Statistics? 5. Should there be a strengthening of the centralized departmental focus for staff education and training? 6. What should APHA have to say about G.P.C. (Group Performance Control) Programs? 7. Should there be recommendations with reference to utilization of and the ratios of professional to clerical and non-professional supporting personnel? 8. Should there be recommendations concerning the role of program and district staffs in budget planning? 9. Where should the leadership for Mental Health be placed in the Department? 10. What should we recommend with reference to eligibility determination? Where should responsibility be placed in the Department? What is the relationship to other Department standards? 11. Is any change in relationship to educational institutions to be recommended? Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/mmbd0227
